title: Run weekly inventories on Shopify sales
author: Lorena
readme: This workflow is scheduled to run every week, when it gets all your Shopify orders, calculates their sales value, stores the data in Google Sheets, and sends a notification message to a Slack channel.
readme_zh: 该工作流程设定为每周自动运行一次，其功能包括：获取所有Shopify订单、计算销售总额、将数据存储至Google表格，并向Slack频道发送通知消息。
title_zh: 每周对Shopify销售进行库存盘点
